医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为期 18 个月的冥想计划可改善老年人的心理健康由伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 联合领导的国际团队进行的一项新的随机对照试验发现，经过 18 个月的冥想计划可以改善老年人的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=678dee3f-26a8-40f7-bd78-897a3418fdbd Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:48:20 -0500 18-month meditation program improves psychological wellbeing in seniors
不良的童年经历可能会增加年轻人肌肉畸形的几率发表在《临床社会工作杂志》上的一项新研究发现，在 18 岁之前经历过不良童年经历 (ACE) 的青少年和年轻人明显更有可能出现肌肉畸形症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235685fe-9dd9-4fb0-8dd3-9506901dad8e Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:25:28 -0500 Adverse childhood experiences may increase the odds of muscle dysmorphia in young people
脑肽被认为是酗酒的关键因素酒精是世界上最常见的成瘾物质。在美国，过度饮酒每年造成 2,490 亿美元的损失，并导致约 88,000 人死亡，以及各种慢性疾病和社会问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da6aeb59-5587-45d0-9881-1605c66cf037 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:12:04 -0500 Brain peptide identified as key player in heavy alcohol drinking
研究发现关键前列腺癌治疗的利用存在种族差异加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与其他种族和族裔群体（包括白人或拉丁裔男性）相比，被诊断出患有晚期前列腺癌的黑人男性接受新型激素治疗的可能性明显较低治疗已被证明可以有效控制前列腺肿瘤的生长并延长患有该疾病的男性的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42809a34-fa63-4165-933e-75b4fc89cba0 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 13:51:33 -0500 Study finds racial disparity in the utilization of crucial prostate cancer therapy
COVID-19 后贫困和住房条件恶劣与行动不便风险增加有关德克萨斯 A&M 大学公共卫生学院的新研究表明，那些生活在持续贫困和住房条件恶劣的人在感染 COVID-19 后更有可能出现新的行动不便问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Poverty-and-poor-housing-linked-to-increased-risk-of-mobility-issues-after-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Poverty-and-poor-housing-linked-to-increased-risk-of-mobility-issues-after-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d5db4eb-416b-45a4-9877-2e3fa825e527 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:57:00 -0500 Poverty and poor housing linked to increased risk of mobility issues after COVID-19
研究提供了对新生儿李斯特菌病长期后果的见解母胎李斯特菌病是一种严重的疾病，可导致流产、早产或严重的新生儿感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-provides-insights-into-long-term-consequences-of-neonatal-listeriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-provides-insights-into-long-term-consequences-of-neonatal-listeriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e748d4d7-e2f0-41c8-b3e2-a0ef5e580ec1 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:50:00 -0500 Study provides insights into long-term consequences of neonatal listeriosis
健身视频游戏可能会歪曲糖尿病患者的运动强度一项新研究的作者警告 1 型糖尿病患者谨慎使用健身视频游戏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Fitness-video-games-may-misrepresent-exercise-intensity-for-people-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Fitness-video-games-may-misrepresent-exercise-intensity-for-people-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eba160ae-7d47-4736-9c6c-252b2e72f63c Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:44:00 -0500 Fitness video games may misrepresent exercise intensity for people with diabetes
灵活的育儿假政策是移民融入的关键：研究休兼职育儿假或休较短时间育儿假的母亲更有可能从事创收活动或接受教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Flexible-parental-leave-policies-key-for-immigrant-integration-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Flexible-parental-leave-policies-key-for-immigrant-integration-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f048ee24-043e-4422-a0a2-ad943aae3007 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:36:00 -0500 Flexible parental leave policies key for immigrant integration: Study
研究表明，以儿童为中心的方法是建设繁荣社区的蓝图通过为最年轻的居民提供周到的教育和社会服务，社区可以繁荣发展；但挑战在于领导人要共同努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/A-child-centric-approach-is-the-blueprint-for-building-thriving-communities-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/A-child-centric-approach-is-the-blueprint-for-building-thriving-communities-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=083ff55b-aa8b-4239-b15b-33eaacfbb52a Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:22:00 -0500 A child-centric approach is the blueprint for building thriving communities, study shows
Hevolution-AFAR 新研究者奖扩大规模，拨款 1600 万美元美国老龄化研究联合会 (AFAR) 很高兴地宣布向老龄生物学和老年科学研究领域的 Hevolution-AFAR 新研究者奖提供 1600 万美元的资助，该资助计划旨在帮助美国和加拿大实验室的早期职业研究者能够研究扩大健康跨度的疗法和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Hevolution-AFAR-New-Investigator-Awards-expanded-with-2416-million-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Hevolution-AFAR-New-Investigator-Awards-expanded-with-2416-million-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8f4e967-744a-4947-b95c-f2b59f4268f8 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:16:00 -0500 Hevolution-AFAR New Investigator Awards expanded with $16 million grant
